title: I'm stuck on loading champion page
body: Hi guys, I need your help. When I'm finish selected my champ and the time ran out to the loading page it became back and I can not do anything, can not move my mouse and command+tab. When I tired the command+option+esc,  it is work but it has the reconnect icon with "The game has crashed" so I try to reconnect and it still has the same problem. However, sometime when I do that it has a song coming up. So I decide to download the client again and It is not working too, have the same problem. I did try to restart my Macbook and it doesn't help. By the way, it just happen today and I'm can not connect to game for 2 games now, I don't want to be leaver.

replies.body:
I'm guessing you playing on a mac.
1) Go to network preferences
2) Click on advance...
3) Go to the DNS tab
4) Add 8.8.8.8 to the DNS Servers
5) Add 8.8.4.4 to the DNS Servers
6) Click OK and apply changes

Let me know if this helps.
yes i'm playing on Mac. It doesn't work, still have that problem

Could you try changing your TCP/IP settings to:

"Using DHCP with Manual Address"

For the IPv4 Address, just put 192.168.1.XXX
where XXX is any number from 1 to 254

After that restart your com and your router.

i'm giving up, I just send the problem the player support. I'll wait for them.

Thank you.
